entries.description: SageMaker: SSH configuration errors now display line numbers and include an "Open SSH Config" button
SageMaker Unified Studio: Fixed s3 table catalog node showing error when it's empty
CloudFormation: hide deployment button when change set is not deployable, add delete button when change set has no changes
CloudFormation: Shorten/simplify deployment prompts by prompting for deployment mode first
feat(lambda): add support for lmi function resource node
